decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The use hereby permitted shall be discontinued and the land reinstated to its former condition on or before

Condition : 3 - Materials and details of junctions, angled corners and piers of the proposed wall be reserved for detailed approval.  Reason for condition:To ensure that a satisfactory form of development takes place on the site and to protect the setting of the listed wall.

Condition : 4 - Plans for the replacement arch be reserved for detailed approval.  Reason for condition:To ensure that a satisfactory form of development takes place on the site and to protect the setting of the listed wall.

Condition : 5 - Details of the new timber hut be reserved for detailed approval.  Reason for condition:In view of the nature of the proposed buildings and proximity to a listed wall. Informative:All building operations shall take place from Station Road and should not take access from or affect the operation of the Merton Relief Road.
description: ERECTION OF TWO TIMBER HUTS AND BOUNDARY WALL ENCLOSURE.
